product_name: Gerber GDC Tech Skin Pocket Knife
long_description: A member of the Daily Carry line, the Gerber GDC Tech Skin pocket knife folds down small to fit easily in your pocket and folds out to reveal a reliable and durable cutting tool.
short_description: A member of the Daily Carry line, the Gerber GDC Tech Skin pocket knife folds down small to fit easily in your pocket and folds out to reveal a reliable and durable cutting tool.
